name: Custom Cute and Kawaii Decoden Case FOR IPADS inc Minis NINTENDOS Lgs Lolita Fairy Kei Pastel goth
description:
This listing is for one custom case for ONLY IPADS (1,2,3,mini),Nintendo (DS,DSLite etc.), All LG phone models, and others such as Nokia (all models), other Samsung models and International phone models.
FOR iPhones, iPods, Blackberries and Samsung Galaxies PLEASE VISIT THIS LINK : http://tootalontedxgraliceinwonderland.bigcartel.com/product/custom-decoden-case-for-iphones-ipods-blackberries-samsung-galaxies-please-read-on


The difference in price for the cases is due to some less popular, obscure or international phone cases costing much more for me to get , For Example; iPhone cases tend to be much easier, quicker and cheaper to get whereas certain Nokia or LG models are much harder to find and far more expensive to get (keep in mind that if you do happen to have a model that does not cost me more than £2 or $3 for me to get then I will offer a discount at my discretion!)

Larger cases such as iPads and Nintendos use much more of my supplies sometimes almost triple the amount of cabochons (cute plastic pieces) than an average phone case so the increase in price is necessary.

Either choose from the examples above in the photos,(https://www.etsy.com/uk/listing/108944152/custom-decoden-case-for-ipads-inc-minis?ref=v1_other_1) OR what you would personally like and include your design preference in the PayPal message or etsy message :
For example ; a theme of pink and blue/ candy pieces/Simple layout (5 medium to large pieces)/ Floral/ Hello Kitty/ Creepy Cute/ Pastel/Deserts/Handmade clay foods etc.

Please make sure to include:
~Phone Model e.g. Blackberry Curve 8520.
~Exact colour theme e.g. yellow and pink.
~A preferred special piece e.g. a hello kitty / rilakkuma / eyeballs / Chanel / Roses
Please also note each case is allowed up to 3 handmade pieces, if you'd like any more please contact me :)
Lots of love and Best wishes for the future
Grace of Gralice in Wonderland :)
~

Please note I will try as much as possible to deliver according to your preference , however I may simply not have some pieces in stock or may need to wait for some certain pieces and this can cause your case to take up to 3 weeks to be ready , I will however make sure you know what's going on with your order weekly to keep you up to date and in the know !

Care instructions for your case:
Here are a few tips to keep your kawaii case looking kawaii !
❤ Avoid putting your decoden case in your jeans pocket or near other dyed materials as the dye may transfer to your case.
❤ Treat your case carefully and avoid dropping (I know this is quite hard but it will pay off to be extra careful with it).
❤ When your case gets dirty or dusty simply wipe with a clean, damp cloth or baby wipe , this will easily remove dust and bits of debris.
❤ To really make your case last long I would advise you to use it occasionally and not everyday (this is optional and just a little piece of advice).

Thanks for reading and if you have the time please don't forget to like my new Facebook page for updates , coupons and future giveaways !
www.facebook.com/pages/Gralice-In-Wonderland/548170105200573

name: Custom set of 12 False nails with handpainted nail art - Pick a design from the menu in the picture
description:
This is a set of 12 hand painted artificial nails.
❤ Pick a design above. (Aztec, Crosses, Galaxy, Watermelons,Chanel etc.)
❤ Make sure to type in the design you would like in the Paypal 'NOTE box' when prompted. for e.g 'yellow winking face'
All designs are handpainted by me and will be painted on medium length square false nails.
These nails are one of a kind and are proving popular on sites such as Pinterest, We heart it and Tumblr, so order some cute custom nails today!

Each nail set is shipped safely along with one nail file, a small vial of nail glue, and instructions for application and removal.

If there is anything else you would love to know about this nail set or if you would like a different length or colour as the background of a nail design please don't hesitate to contact me ! 

❤Check out my Tumblr account: Tootalonted.tumblr.com for inspirational nail art ideas and cute phone cases. 

❤Be sure to visit my facebook page for giveaways :
https://www.facebook.com/pages/Gralice-In-Wonderland/548170105200573

❤ My Etsy page for more phone cases : graliceinwonderland.etsy.com

❤My instagram: Gralicee

❤My We Heart it account : Graciee Gracee


Thanks for stopping by!

Much Love,
Grace.
